sourcesContent: import*as t from"react";import{Hub as e}from"aws-amplify";import{UI_CHANNEL as a,ACTION_STATE_MUTATION_STARTED as s,EVENT_ACTION_CORE_STATE_MUTATION as r,ACTION_STATE_MUTATION_FINISHED as o}from"./constants.mjs";import{AMPLIFY_SYMBOL as n}from"../../helpers/constants.mjs";const m=m=>{const[p,c]=t.useState(m),i=t.useCallback((t=>{const m=p;e.dispatch(a,{event:s,data:{prevState:m,newState:t}},r,n),c(t),e.dispatch(a,{event:o,data:{prevState:m,newState:t}},r,n)}),[p]);return[p,i]};export{m as useStateMutationAction};
